mahinda rajapaksha yugaye, rate prajathanthrawadaya, yahapawathma, pilibanda barapathala prashna rasak nirmanaya wi thibiyadi “nirwinditha” sanwidhanayak lesa peni sitim kala rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaya, mathaka sita “etka” wirodhaya wani satanpata uthkarshayata nanwamin maha prajathanthriya sanwidhanayak lesa peni sitimata uthsaha karana muth eya sabawinma awyaja wu hasirimak da yanna soya balima wadagathya.

nawi pilleyita laba di thibu anawashya watinakama matha humbaas biyakin bhrantha wu atham piris men, pilleyige sancharaya yana “palayata“ ahethuwadiwa wiruddha wenu wenuwata, shri lankawa thula nila sancharaye niratha weddi gamyamana wu ayage bhawithawan charikawa awasana nawi pilleyi pawathwu puwathpath sakchchawath, nikuth kala niwedanayath siyumwa pariksha karaddi ismathuwi penena, apa mathru bhumiye aarakshawa wenuwen athishaya wadagath karunu thula, thawath kihipa dinakin subha mohothin (sarwagamika wathawath mada) wiwrutha kerena demuhum adhikaranaya gana sanituhan wu ingi hipayak awadharanaya kirima mema liyamanehi aramuna wanneya.

jyethishayedi pruthiwi kendarayak ho pruthiwiyak gana salaka balimak natha.jyothishaye siddhantha sakasa aththe pruthiwiyata sapekshawa anith grahayange chalithaya salakimeni.pruthiwiye upatha gana wisthara jyethishaye wenath kshethrawalin dakwa athi athara ee pilibadawa ma hata loku danumak natha.pruthiwiye upatha gana dana ganimata hodama kramaya sauragraha mandalaya ha ehi grahaloka athiwima gana nawina widyawe ha budu dahame dakwa athi wisthara igenimayi.
